duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain a minimum sales goal of $4 million annually in the Oil and Gas industry.
Travel up to 60% of the time to manage targeted territory in OK and TX.
Cold calling, account management, presentation development, and closing deals.
Track all sales contacts, meetings, opportunities, proposals, and orders.
Develop and execute an annual territory sales plan.
Partner with operations and logistics teams for project execution and completement.
General understanding of power generators, diesel engines, electrical distribution equipment, HVAC equipment, and oil-free air compressors.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Sales Management, or related field.
